title: Dynamic Event Orchestration Engine
description: Event management system with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), DTO-based REST API with explicit exception handling, and QR code generation for ticket verification.

title: Enterprise-Grade Authentication System
description: Stateless authentication system using JWT access and refresh tokens with role and scope-based authorization, token rotation, revocation, and replay protection.

title: API Incidence Monitor
description: Decoupled API starter and collector service that automatically captures API latency and status codes, with Bucket4j rate limiting and JWT-secured collector endpoints.
